page.title: 08THE GREY LADY
page.content: There are two ghost stories about a ghost called 'The Grey Lady'.The first is that the ghost is a nun from the dissolved nunnery of St. Giles in the wood of which no trace now remains.It is true that several nuns were found buried in the front lawn.She is said to be one of these nuns who haunts the ground around her burial place. The second story is that she is the ghost of a servant at the Sebright's home.Accused of a crime,the maid had been sentenced to death.Faced with a hanging she threw herself into the workings of the clock tower and this awful death causes her spirit to wander about what is now Beechwood Park School.
